text: The 2002–03 FIS Cross-Country World Cup was the 22nd official World Cup season in cross-country skiing for men and ladies. The season began in Düsseldorf, Germany, on 26 October on 2002 and was concluded in Falun, Sweden, on 23 March 2003. Mathias Fredriksson of Sweden won the overall men's cup, and Bente Skari of Norway won the women's. == Calendar == === Men === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff;
